about_the_game:
Dead Man's Nightmares is a tragic story about a teenage girl trying to escape from a mysterious place while collecting different memories of who she used to be as a child and a teenager while learning the truth of why she ended up here.

No escaping:
In this psychological horror game, there is no resting you will always be in danger and there is no place to hide if you find there is no coming back if you don't care stealthy the result will be death.

Sound:
In this game, Sound will be your friend while the enemies make a lot of noise that way you know if you are in danger or you are safe and you can continue exploring.

The unknown place:
In this strange place, you will be enjoying different sub-places in which every single one has its own enemy or enemies like the park of loneliness or the castle of memories.

Enemies:
The enemies are demons searching for your soul to give it to the devil of eternal hell, the clowns, the narrators, and the devil's assistance will make your life harder.

Collectibles:
Collect the different postcards of ''the ones who couldn't survive'' and learn the different stories of people who got trapped in this mysterious place.

Acts:
Dead man's nightmare is counted by different acts from the prologue to act 7 and all are in the same game!!!

Graphics:
Enjoy the full potential of Dead Man's Nightmares with nvidea technology like Nvidia DLLS using the power of Unreal Engine 5

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains concepts of depression, anxiety, and suicide that may not be suitable for all audiences.
It also features flashing lights and imagery, jumpscares that may cause discomfort, and/or seizures for epilepsy, Please consult your doctor before entering this game.

name: Dead Man's Nightmares

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Posible changes in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Posible changes in the future

short_description: Ready to survive the eternal nightmare? Dead man's nightmares is a psychological first-person horror game in which you will explore an unknown place as Emma and learn the truth about who you used to be collecting different memories in this mysterious place.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
